mapper.select: select w.id , w.name name,w.salary salary,w.entry_time entryTime,d.name deptName ,l.id leaderId,l.name leaderName,j.id jobId,j.name jobname from w_emp w left join w_dept d on w.dept_id = d.id left join w_job j on w.job_id = j.id left join w_leader l on w.leader_id = l.id limit #{start},#{length};
